Name: LIBLADE
About the game: ※Note※ A controller with two analog sticks is required to play. 'LIBLADE' is a side-scrolling action game that features slashing action utilizing the analog stick. Use the analog stick to quickly unleash a powerful slash that will cover the screen. Flick the stick, and come on, slash! Rotate the stick to carve up your enemies! Time it just right to reflect enemy attacks! Explore the area and defeat many enemies to grow your skill tree and learn new techniques. 'LIBLADE' is a pure action game. Gain new abilities and defeat your enemies with a variety of slashes to reach the end of the line. Come and experience the new twin-stick slash action. Feel the joy of Stick-mashing!!! Initial play time: approx. 3.5-6.5 hours (from test player)
